English: one-room apartment (bedroom and living room in one)
parking space heating fee (useful in winter)
monthly maintenance fee for owners in apartment building
janitor (who e.g. mows the grass and plows the snow)
serviceman (who comes to e.g. repair broken faucets)
housing manager (where you get help if you e.g. lock yourself out)
housing company (all owners in an apartment building belong)
cool cellar, section for each resident to store e.g. jams
separate locked storage section for each resident's stuff
parking space (often reserved to specific resident)
outside garbage container area with roof (often locked)
rug rack (in the yard, for anyone to use)
laundry room (can be used by all residents)
entrance to apartment building (e.g. A, B)
renovations to the facade of the building
